# Vfa Slider

## Install

Run `yarn add vfa-slider @pqina/flip` 

## Use

Import `import { VfaSliderModule } from 'vfa-slider'` to your `app.modules.ts`


```
@NgModule({
  declarations: [
    AppComponent
  ],
  imports: [
    BrowserModule,
    VfaSliderModule
  ],
  providers: [],
  bootstrap: [AppComponent]
})
```

`<vfa-slider></vfa-slider>`
